div.p:
Schools are closed Monday, March 16 through Friday, April 24, 2020.
Subscribe to News Releases. Meal PickUp Sites. Caroline County COVID-19 website.
Visit our Continuity of Learning page.

div.div: Caroline County Public Schools does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, disability, or age in its programs and activities, and provides equal access to the Boy Scouts and other designated youth groups. For inquiries regarding the non-discrimination policy, please contact the Director the Student Services at 410.479.1460.

Caroline County Public Schools
204 Franklin Street Denton, Maryland 21629
Phone: 410.479.1460 | Fax: 410.479.0108
